entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Carlyle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 12:58 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
